MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Penygreen Road, Old  Hall Road  and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and line patrols and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5 :49 PM on 18th December 2020.
